reviews.text: Very refreshing to find a really smart motel. This one is obviously pretty new, and although the location isn't glamorous, it is set well back from the road, and looks good.
reviews.title: Well done Rodeway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are large, well fitted, and in extremely good condition. Mine was very clean, everything worked nicely, and was quiet. Free Wifi was good. Took supper at the new Mexican restaurant "Playa Azul " one block away: a good meal, very reasonably priced. Free breakfast in the morning was also good.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.text: About the only thing I could find to criticise was the front desk had no quarters available to use the laundry facility. Overall, excellent value at $64 and highly recommended.
reviews.title: A welcome respite! Wonderful!

reviews.text: Nice and clean for the price. Very friendly staff. 1rst time visiting since I was born there in 1953. I wish I could have been raised there. Nice town.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Clean and Inexpensive

likes.liked: — convenient location to our family reunion; cleanliness and bed comfort
